act.title: Listen carefully
act.intro: Listen to the sentences below and decide what is being said.

op.fb: incorrect: the questioner asks if he is a student
incorrect: he joined the school only this year

item.quest: What is the person doing in Britain?

op.fb: incorrect: she studied for her Bachelor's degree in China.
incorrect: there is no mentioning of a Master's degree.

item.quest: Why can she speak good Chinese?
item.op: She has studied Chinese for six years.

op.fb: incorrect: she has never been to China.

item.op: She has lived in China for six years.

op.fb: incorrect: there is no mentioning of a Master's course.

item.op: She finished her Master's course in Chinese.
